item.title: Hosting your static site with AWS S3, Route 53, and CloudFront
item.description: Some time ago I decided to stop freeloading on GitHub pages and move my static page for vickylai.com to Amazon Web Services (AWS). item.title: Top free resources for developing coding superpowers
item.description: I’m frequently asked for my opinion on how to get started on being a freelance developer. If you’re hoping to live the life of a remote working digital nomad, whichever career you choose, having a little coding expertise in your back pocket will be a big benefit. Here’s a quick list of resources that you should definitely look at first if you’re hoping to gain some coding superpowers for free.
